message.content: {"given_definition_quality":82,"better_definition":"at the same time; doing two things together","sentence":"他们一边唱，一边笑。","image_prompt":"Soft apocalypse animation style: Two children sitting together, both singing and laughing at the same time. The atmosphere is hopeful post-apocalyptic, colors are soft and muted, with warm tones highlighting their expressions.","sentence_translation":"They sing and laugh at the same time."}
